sen.j: 1853年、マシュー・カルブレース・ペリーによる浦賀への黒船来航（蒸気船）とかけた狂歌「泰平の眠りをさます上喜撰 たつた四杯で夜も寝られず」で有名。
sen.e: The brand is famous for the kyoka (comic (satirical) tanka) that played on words associated with the arrival of the Black Ships (jokisen (steamboat)) by Matthew Calbraith PERRY, "Jokisen is such a good tea that you have trouble sleeping at night with just four cups and rouses you from your quiet long sleep."
